text:
Using artificial intelligence
and machine learning on AWS can

be transformative,
unlocking a new level of productivity.

AWS democratizes machine
learning extending its reach

beyond large, well-funded
technology companies to startups,

government agencies, and businesses
across all sectors.

Simplifying the use of foundation
models is at the heart of this
democratization.

Foundation models are large,
pretrained machine learning

models that power generative
AI, a type of AI that creates

new content, such as conversations,
stories, and images.

You can now customize foundation
models to your business
requirements.

This customization
process is more efficient

and more cost effective
than building a model from scratch,

requiring a fraction of the data
and computational resources.

One of the key challenges
when venturing into generative

AI is finding and accessing
the right foundation models.

AWS addresses this challenge
with Amazon Bedrock, a service

that provides access to foundation
models developed by leading

AI companies, as well as AWS
itself.

Amazon Bedrock streamlines
the development of generative

AI applications and makes the
customization of foundation

models more efficient by using
your organizationâ€™s
proprietary data.

It provides a straightforward
path to integrating AI into

your existing applications
without the need to manage
infrastructure.

Allowing you to bring AI solutions
to market more quickly.

To further drive down the costs
and make AI more accessible,

AWS offers cost-effective
cloud infrastructure,

such as AI-optimized
compute instances.

This cloud infrastructure
is specifically designed

for machine learning and generative
AI workloads and delivers

significant savings on training
and inference costs.

AWS also provides tools to enhance
developer productivity.

Amazon CodeWhisperer
is an AI coding companion

that accelerates the coding
process by generating

code suggestions based on 
developer's comments.

AWS prioritizes data security
and privacy.

The customization process
on Amazon Bedrock ensures

that your data remains private
and confidential, keeping

it encrypted and within your
virtual private cloud.

AWS is taking significant
strides to bring AI to the forefront
of business operations.

Harnessing AI or ML tools can
revolutionize your business

processes, foster innovation,
and drive new levels of productivity.
